sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
The Instance View of a Virtual Machine.

Inputs:

  • Subscription ID - Uniquely Identify Microsoft Azure Subscription ID.
  • Resource GroupName - Name of the Resource Group.
  • VM Name - Name of the Virtual Machine.
  • Expand - The Expand expression to apply on the operation.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure in Virtual Machine Occurs.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs. The status will be Error only in case of any failure in Virtual Machine.

Error Messages:

  • Subscription ID Invalid or Missing
  • ResourecGroup Name Already Exists
  • Authentication Error
  • Instance Not Found
  • Unknown Error

To use this action, a corresponding Microsoft Azure Virtual Machine connection and credential must be created and associated with the Microsoft Azure Virtual Machine Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

  • Resource GroupName - Name of the Resource Group.
  • VM Name - Name of the Virtual Machine.

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure in Virtual Machine Occurs.
  • Error Message - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs. The status will be Error only in case of any failure in Virtual Machine.

Error Messages:

  • Subscription ID Invalid or Missing
